meanings.definition: the beliefs or practices associated with the rule of a kaiser
meanings.sent1: The kaiserisms of the ancient ruler were deeply rooted in tradition.
meanings.sent2: Historians study the kaiserisms of past emperors to understand their reigns.
meanings.sent3: The kaiser's quirky kaiserisms made the courtiers chuckle.
meanings.sent4: Her commitment to kaiserisms was as steadfast as a mountain.
meanings.sent5: The kaiserisms of leadership were etched in the annals of history.

meanings.definition: the mannerisms or behaviors characteristic of a kaiser
meanings.sent1: His stern kaiserisms commanded respect from all who met him.
meanings.sent2: The kaiserisms of the ruler were evident in his authoritative gestures.
meanings.sent3: The kaiser's playful kaiserisms amused the courtiers during banquets.
meanings.sent4: Her kaiserisms shone brightly in the dimly lit room.
meanings.sent5: The kaiser's kaiserisms left a lasting impression on the kingdom.
